title: At Sivershchyna and Slobozhanschyna directions Russian army shelled Popivka, Iskryskivschyna, Bilopillya, Velyka Pysarivka of...
content: At Sivershchyna and Slobozhanschyna directions Russian army shelled Popivka, Iskryskivschyna, Bilopillya, Velyka Pysarivka of Sumy region, - General Staff of Armed Forces of Ukraine says in the evening report
author: Live UA Map
